title: Personal Site
subtitle: Personal
about: The website you are currently on!

title: Shadowfall
subtitle: Oregon Game Project Challenge
about:
In Shadowfall you play as a researcher that worked for SOLIS CORP, however during an experiment the emergency alarm goes off. You enter cryo until the alarm turns off and you are safe. When you awake however, something isn't quite right, the sun, the light, it burns. 
You must travel during the day, avoiding the sun by sticking close to the shadows, and hide in buildings at night to avoid those who were caught in the suns gaze. Guided by the mysterious voice on the radio, you must make your decision, will you save yourself, or fix your mistake?

title: EcoMap
subtitle: Hackathon
about: EcoMap is an innovative web application bringing critical energy information to a wide audience. With updating statistics gathered through multiple decades, EcoMap delivers the important data to consumers.

title: Mission:Citizen
subtitle: Web Design
about: Mission: Citizen is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit dedicated to helping future US citizens pass the naturalization exam and become effective citizens. They offer citizenship classes at Sherwood Library, Roosevelt High School, and Beaverton City Library in three 10 week terms throughout the year.

title: M:C Online
subtitle: Web Development
about: Mission:Citizen's online learning platform allows students to learn and prepare for the naturalization test from anywhere. Students can watch pre-recorded videos of teachers going over each lesson and complete quizzes to test their knowledge, all at their own pace.

title: Bobo Tea House
subtitle: Web Development
about: A website for Bobo Tea House, a locally-owned bubble tea shop located in Hillsboro, Oregon.

title: Newton Raphson & Algorithms
subtitle: Math
about: A collection of iterative root-finding algorithms (Newton Raphson, Bisection, and Secant) and a comparison of their efficiencies/complexity.

title: Riemann Sums
subtitle: Math
about: This program calculates and models Riemann Sums and numeric integrals.

title: MarketPush
subtitle: Internship
about: MarketPush is a B2B Marketplace platform which allows manufacturers to effortlessly implement a multi-vendor marketplace. Designed to streamline your dropship, marketplace, or vendor direct ship programs, reducing the resources needed to onboard new suppliers and products.

title: Carbon Calculator
subtitle: Hackathon
about: Carbon Calculator is a web application designed to aid the user in decreasing their carbon footprint, discover where and when you emit the most CO2, and see how you can prevent or offset that amount.
